name: Codename Droid
overview: This was a sequel to Stryker's Run. Using better graphics, and a multi-level environment, Codename Droid added new features such as item manipulation, flying jet-pacs, and end of level bosses. This game was one of the last decent, original Superior releases (if you exclude Exile) to be released for the BBC. It was around this time that the Atari ST and Commodore Amiga began taking over the games scene, and the BBC was becoming long in the tooth and it's days were sadly numbered.
